notes: This bundle demonstrates consent refusal handling. No PEEP or EES is created because the resident declined consent. The duty holder has recorded the offer, the refusal, and the reason. A minimal PCFRA was captured via brief phone conversation (self-report only; low confidence). The duty holder will re-offer consent at the next annual tenancy review. This approach respects the resident's autonomy while maintaining compliance evidence.
